Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Steam Engine 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
1 Flame Body 4 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
18 Steelworker 7 Powers up Steel-type moves.
36 Flash Fire 5 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
54 High-Pressured 4 The Pokémon generates a heat wave when it's hit by an attack.
72 White Smoke 6 The Pokémon's white smoke prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
90 Mega Launcher 7 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
100 Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Score Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 2 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 07 Illuminate 5 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 12 Sturdy 7 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 6 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 14 Flash Fire 5 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 7 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 19 Sand Force 7 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Disc 20 Rock Head 6 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 21 Poison Heal 8 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Disc 40 Sand Stream 9 The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
Disc 42 Magma Armor 3 The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents it from becoming frostbitten.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Score Description
Aftermath 5 Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
Bulletproof 8 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Calcifate 8 Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Defeatist -2 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Heatproof 6 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
High-Pressured 4 The Pokémon generates a heat wave when it's hit by an attack.
Klutz -2 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Mega Launcher 7 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
Pressure 6 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Purifying Salt 7 The Pokémon's salt protects it from statuses and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
Rocky Payload 5 Boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
Rough Skin 6 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
Slow Start -5 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -2 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Steam Engine 3 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
Steelworker 7 Powers up Steel-type moves.
Stench 3 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Toxic Boost 6 Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.
Truant -5 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
White Smoke 6 The Pokémon's white smoke prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
Blaze 5 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Calderize 8 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Flame Body 4 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Mimicry 3 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Arid Surge 9 Turns the ground into Arid Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Drought 9 Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Magma Surge 9 Turns the ground into Magma Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Motor Drive 7 Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Volt Absorb 8 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
